name: Pong (itch) (cheeky bloks)
description:
The paddle is controlled by your mouse. The ball will bounce off walls and the paddle. Try to keep the ball on the screen for one minute to reach a score of 3000 and to win. 

Pong2 has an obstacle the ball bounces off, for added fun, and is only 50p more. It also has a slower speed to start but gets faster.
